overview:
Eric Lindstrom is the Chief Creative Officer at Social Gaming Network. Lindstrom joined SGN from Crystal Dynamics where he served as creative director, game and story designer, screenplay editor and co- writer.

Since 1988, Lindstrom has worked as senior game designer, game concept developer and writer with Electronic Arts on such popular titles as the James Bond series and Lost Files of Sherlock Holmes: The Case of the Serrated Scalpel.

Lindstrom received a B.S. in mechanical engineering from the University of California, Berkeley.
